choices.text: Yeah. It's been nice so far.

talked_previously.text: How about now, still enjoying the party?

choices.text: I'm not worried about that. I have questions.
It's a bit weird, especially with The Jack Rabbit
Were you a kicked out of university?

good_party.text: That's what we love to hear! You got any plans for the rest of the night?

choices.text: I'm going to keep talking around.
Not really a party guy myself.

talked_about_jack_rabbit.text: I know. I tried to talk to him earlier. He's only interested in one thing. I don't even know why he came here to be honest.

asked_why_tiki_came.text: My fath... no. The Mayor personally invited me. What other choice did I have?

the_mayor_son.text: No. Well... alright. Yeah. That's me. Please don't tell anyone though. It's a masquerade for a reason.

choices.text: I won't. You can trust me.

go_to_flapper.text: If you want someone to talk to, you should go talk to The Flapper. It took me an hour before I escaped her grasp.

choices.text: I'd prefer to keep talking to you.

why_come.text: If you're not a party guy, why did you come?

choices.text: I'm not sure to be honest.
I was paid to come here and figure out a hidden traitor by an unknown party earlier today.

needs_job.text: If you need a job, this is a great place to start. This party has a good amount of influential people here. If you keep talking around, I'm sure you'd find someone with a factory who is willing to provide you some work.

choices.text: I'd like to ask you some more questions.

thanks.text: Thanks. You seem trustworthy enough. My father invited everyone here tonight for a reason. We should separate for now though.

no_promises.text: Well, I guess I can't stop you... However, I no longer desire your company.

talk_to_tiki.text: What would you like to talk to me about?

choices.text: Nevermind. I think I'm going to go.
What's it like being the Mayors son?

asked_for_secrets.text: Well... not really. I don't think so at least. Why are you even asking this?

choices.text: I'd just like to know more about you.

boundaries.text: I think you know enough. I think we should cut it here.

we_love_fun.text: It seems that we're on the same page. Let's try our best to keep the party going then! Despite everything.

chat_around.text: Awesome man. You learn anything cool tonight?

what_like_mayor_son.text: Well... It's nice. I suppose. I don't see my father a lot. He's always in the office trying to figure out what is best for the people. He's really passionate about the little man you know?

moving_on.text: Regardless, I think we should cut it here. Hopefully no one overheard us.

said_no.text: I guess I could've... I'm going to go reflect on what you said....

no_sure_tbh.text: Well... you're here now. So have fun! Do you have any plans?

choices.text: I'm going to go chat around some more.
I think I'll go for now.

was_just_a_joke.text: Hahahahah! You're quite funny. You really had me sweating there for a moment.

seriously_not_a_joke.text: I..I really think you should leave now.

defensive_tiki_man.text: What, who told you... Look, it wasn't that simple. But they didn't kick me out, my father took me out as punishment. Said it would be harder for reelection if I stayed there.

leave_me_be.text: Look man, I don't know who told you that, but you must've asked around exposing me. I really trusted you man. I'm sorry but I don't wanna see you here anymore.

betrayed_tiki_man_response.text: Oh, it's you... I still don't trust you... I'm just too trusting of everyone...
